In a lush green garden, there lived a little spider named Silky. Unlike her friends who spun webs high in the trees, Silky trembled at the thought of heights. One day, while exploring the ground, she stumbled upon a butterfly trapped in a thorny bush. With courage swelling in her tiny heart, Silky climbed higher than she ever had, weaving a delicate rope to rescue the butterfly. As they fluttered away, Silky realized that sometimes, facing fears can lead to the most beautiful friendships. From that day on, she spun her webs wherever she pleased, no longer afraid of the heights.
